item.val: MARINE HOUSE SEASIR started and owned by Mr. Hideshi Inai, from Okinawa Aka Island since 1983, operating as a small marine sport center. Till today this company is the longest and biggest running Dive Company in Okinawa. Our passion and effort Marine House SEASIR owns two main Dive Center at Naha, Aka Island (Akajima) and our 3 branch of water sports facility Marine Club Marine Club BERRY and luxury charter cruise La Mer Riche. With multi-lingual instructors speak Japanese, English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Bahasa Malaysia.
Daily trip to KERAMA Scuba diving and Snorkeling.
Accommodation, Scuba diving, Snorkeling and Kayak.
Daily water sports and SEGWAY facility.
